data.text:
After spending time with her, there are many things I came to 
understand about Daitaku Helios, a party Uma Musume that was very 
much like the Sun. And one of those things was―

Boom boom boooo～m! 
I'll blast right through this training～～～!!
data.name: Daitaku Helios

data.text:
Motivation's a real drag, yo～…… 
life's like a dude in a speedo～～～～
data.name: Daitaku Helios

data.text:
Wei wei we～i☆ 
Keep the good vibes comin' FOOOOOO～～～～～!!!
data.name: Daitaku Helios

data.text:
……this is usually how training went. Her mood from moment to 
moment, greatly affected how things progressed.

But still, lately Daitaku Helios' condition has been pretty good. 
Seems like she's enjoying school life too, if that's the case――

Nuaaaaaaa～! I've just been repeatin' that hellish training menu! 
Give me back my youthful life～～～～～!!
data.name: Daitaku Helios

data.text:
And those Limited Edition Uma Pyoi Love You Love You pancakes…… 
I thought they'd be my friends forever――
data.name: Daitaku Helios

data.text:
Wouldn't it be a real downer if someone you knew transferred 
away suddenly!? It's the same as that! For real!
data.name: Daitaku Helios

choices.text: Parting is such sweet sorrow, huh?
Parting is such sweet sorrow, huh?

data.text:
Right!? 
Not good～…… haven't felt this empty in a while.
data.name: Daitaku Helios

choices.text: Wanna go find something like it?

data.text:
Hmmm～～～. But isn't that hopeless? 
It's those Awe&Some friends we're talkin' about, right?
data.name: Daitaku Helios

data.text:
Ah, but I'll gladly take Trai-pi's heart! 
Yes-Please-And-Thank-You, Trai-poyo-check!
data.name: Daitaku Helios

data.text:
She was trying to force a smile, but it caught 
my attention…… Though to be honest, I only understood 
half of why she was depressed.

But, as Daitaku Helios' trainer, 
I had to do something to cheer her up…!
Hmm? What's up, Trai-poyo? The ceiling?
data.name: Daitaku Helios

choices.text: P-party peeps should raise the roof……!

data.text:
……!! That's it, Trai-pippi…… 
I got it, loud and clear!
data.name: Daitaku Helios

data.text:
So that's what you're aimin' for! A party animal!! 
You shoulda said that sooner～～～!
data.name: Daitaku Helios

data.text:
You don't need to hold back～～～! Leave it to me, okay!? 
I'll turn ya in to a proper party animal!!
data.name: Daitaku Helios

data.text:
Allllright, let's go～! 
We're gonna really let loose～～～～～☆
data.name: Daitaku Helios

data.text:
Without giving me time to object, 
Daitaku Helios dragged me out in to the city.

『Holdin' a rockin' Live, with a call 
out from the past, Come on!』
data.name: Daitaku Helios

data.text:
『We're livin' it up! We're livin' it up!』 
C'mon, I can't hear ya～～～～～!!
data.name: Daitaku Helios

data.text:
Old lady! 
One honey～ MAX, Mega Size!
data.name: Daitaku Helios

data.text:
Trai-pi, if you're a party peep, 
go for it! Poyo it! 'Kay?
data.name: Daitaku Helios

data.text:
No way～～～～～～!? Trai-pi, you're a pro! 
Grabbin' two at the same time is crazy! Bring 'em in, go-!!
data.name: Daitaku Helios

data.text:
―Hey, they fell! Ahahahaa!! 
No choice but to go for three next, huh?!
data.name: Daitaku Helios

data.text:
Uwahahahaa! It's already evening! 
Anyways, good work today～☆
data.name: Daitaku Helios

data.text:
Got that right☆ Soon, I'll make a party animal out of you! 
We'll max out those vibes, Bwaan bwaa～n!
data.name: Daitaku Helios

data.text:
Speaking of that, Trai-pi, since you've barely debuted, 
let's keep this goin'! Drop me a LANE anytime! Okay?
data.name: Daitaku Helios

data.text: Next time I'll take ya to a real Awe&Some party☆
data.name: Daitaku Helios

data.text:
In the end, she still thought I wanted to become 
a party peep, but since she seemed to be feeling 
better, I was alright with this result.

Understanding more about partying would probably make 
it easier to keep her motivation up. ……And maybe aiming 
to be a party peep wouldn't be so bad.
